about_the_game:
Bonus tracks are included. These are 'variations' of some of the main mission themes that were intended to seamlessly play when the player entered key moments in the game. These were unfortunately never implemented into the game, but we are happy to be able to include them in the soundtrack.

The Soundtrack for Espire 1: VR Operative was composed by Christopher Lisati in 2018 & 2019.

The files are in MP3 format (320kps CBR) converted from the original production .WAV files.
Uncompressed WAV files of the soundtrack are available as an optional download.

short_description: Purchase the soundtrack for Espire 1: VR Operative containing over 70 minutes of high-fidelity music across 32 tracks! This soundtrack DLC contains every instance of music found in Espire 1: VR Operative. The files are in MP3 format (320kps CBR) converted from the original production .WAV files.
